Six people have been arrested in a false imprisonment investigation in County Meath in the Republic of Ireland.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
GardaÃ­ (Irish police) said the arrests were made after officers carried out a planned search of a house at Castletown in Navan on Thursday evening.
Those detained were three men, two women and a girl under 18 years of age.
A Garda spokesman would not confirm state media reports that up to 20 people were found in the house.
The six suspects are being held at police stations in County Meath.
